title: ArtyTorrent Pack 83-Loopmasters Producer Essentials pt1-Drums
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 83-Loopmasters Producer Essentials pt1-Drums
-------------------------------------------------------------

LM PE part 1: Drum + Percussion Loops.

Loopmasters Producers Essentials is an excellent resource for musicians working in a range of genres. The full retail package contains loops, oneshots, MIDI files, and plug-in presets in a variety of formats. If you make money from music, I recommend you buy a copy. <a href="
http://www.loopmasters.com/sampleshop/10Expand.asp?ProductCode=LMOS_04" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.loopmasters.com/sampleshop/10Expand.asp?ProductCode=LMOS_04</a>

I&#039;m uploading selected parts of the package for test-drive purposes. First up is this collection of drum and percussion loops.

Torrent contains 9 RAR files with 196 samples
---------------------------------------------
LM PE 2 Step 130-135 (14 loops)
LM PE DnB 160-166 (20 loops)
LM PE Electro 100-135 (10 loops)
LM PE Hip Hop 90-110 (6 loops)
LM PE Indian Perc Loops 60-150 (18 loops)
LM PE Live Drum Fills (6 oneshots)
LM PE Live Drum Loops (102 loops)
LM PE Perc loops 91-120 (10 loops)
LM PE RnB 100 (10 loops)

Samples have been converted, renamed and categorized according to my usual system, with approximate tempo included in each filename.
All files are normalized and acidized 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz. 

--
Arty - "Another essential production from Loopmasters"
23rd February 2008.
